channel.title: Entertainment
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Entertainment, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Demi Lovato Gets Candid About Having Kids, Admits She Thinks 'a Lot' About Having 'Clock That Ticks'
item.description: Demi Lovato could be growing her family in the near future. The singer, 33, spoke with Apple Music in an interview about her new album, It's Not That Deep, and talked about her relationship with singer Jutes. Lovato, who tied the knot with Jutes, 34, in May, said she's hoping to have kids one day.
